about_the_game:
About the Game

"Cuppy Coffee Sim" is a first-person simulation game with a calm mindset and many details of managing a café.

Café Management

Design your café to be beautiful, aesthetic, and efficient. Determine where your customers will sit. Organize your decorations and provide the perfect experience for your customers.

Product Supply

Use your in-game tablet to order products and items. Store the goods in your warehouse and place them on the shelves. Produce and sell new products with your items.

Payment

After consuming your products, customers leave cash on their tables. Don't forget to collect the cash for payment.

Market and Economy

Face the challenges of a realistic market. Pay attention to the quality and value of the products you use in production. By producing more valuable products with high-quality ingredients, earn more profit. Focus on ensuring customer satisfaction and maintaining your reputation. As your reputation increases, you will become more recognized and attract more customers.

Café Upgrades

Invest in your business as you earn money. Expand your café’s usable area to accommodate more customers. Decorate your café with different items, colors, and ornaments to attract customers' interest.

In "Cuppy Coffee Sim," every decision is crucial. Can you balance customer satisfaction, financial management and decoration to transform a modest café into a masterpiece?
